title_en: SDG 11.6.2 : Mean Levels of Fine Particulate Matter in Cities
title_ms: SDG 11.6.2 : Purata Tahap Zarah Halus di Bandarr
description_en: Annual mean concentration of fine suspended particles matter (PM) across urban populations in cities, broken down by particle type.
description_ms: Purata tahunan kepekatan zarah halus (PM) dalam kalangan penduduk bandar, dengan pecahan mengikut jenis zarah halus.
methodology_en: Data sourced from Department of Environment Malaysia
methodology_ms: Sumber data dari Jabatan Alam Sekitar Malaysia

fields.name: matter_type
fields.description_en: [Categorical] Type of particulate matter (PM), either ('PM2.5') or ('PM10')
fields.description_ms: [Kategoril] Jenis zarah halus, sama ada ('PM2.5') atau ('PM10')

fields.name: date
fields.description_en: [Date] The date in YYYY-MM-DD format, with MM-DD set to 01-01 since the data is at annual frequency
fields.description_ms: [Tarikh] Tarikh dalam format YYYY-MM-DD, dengan MM-DD ditetapkan sebagai 01-01 kerana data berfrekuensi tahunan

fields.name: mean
fields.description_en: [Float] The mean concentration of fine particulate matter in cities (micrograms per cubic meter)
fields.description_ms: [Apung] Purata konsentrasi zarah halus di bandar-bandar (mikrogram per meter padu)
